Detailed Description

the base class for all method classes

subclasses include SSA, TAULEAP etc. BaseSystem provides the basic methods for printing out the statevecotr of the system.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* BaseSystem::pt2Func)(StochVector &X, StochVector &propensity_vector) [protected]

Function pointer for propensity computation.

This public member will be initialized by the function in ProblemDefi nition.h

Parameters:
X the state vector of the system
propensity_vector the propensity vector of the system. It will get updated in this function.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

BaseSystem::BaseSystem (  ) 

Default constructor.

Create a system with zero species, zero reactions and curr_time to be zero.

BaseSystem::BaseSystem ( int  sp,
int  rxn 
)

constructor

Create a system with sp number of species and rxn number of reactions.

Parameters:
sp an integer argument, indicating the number of species in the system.
rxn an integer argument, indicating the number of reactions in the system.
curr_time a double argument, set the current time of the system, default to be zero.
end_time a double argument, set the end time of the system, default to be zero.

BaseSystem::BaseSystem ( StochVector &  sv,
StoichiometryMatrix &  nu 
)

constructor

Create a system with an initial StochVector and a StochiometryMatrix holding same value with sv and nu respectively.

Parameters:
sv a StochVector type argument.
nu a StochiometryMatrix type argument.
curr_time a double argument, set the current time of the system, default to be zero.
end_time a double argument, set the end time of the system, default to be zero.

BaseSystem::BaseSystem ( StochVector &  sv,
StoichiometryMatrix &  nu,
ReactionList &  list 
)

constructor

Create a system with an initial StochVector and a StochiometryMatrix holding same value with sv and nu respectively. It will also initialize the ReactionList member, in case user wants to use the default propensity function.

Parameters:
sv a StochVector type argument.
nu a StochiometryMatrix type argument.
list a ReactionList type argument.
curr_time a double argument, set the current time of the system, default to be zero.
end_time a double argument, set the end time of the system, default to be zero.

BaseSystem::BaseSystem ( StochVector &  sv,
ReactionList &  list 
)

constructor

Create a system with an initial StochVector holding same value with sv. It will also initialize the ReactionList member, in case user wants to use the default propensity function. Since the StoichiometryMatrix is not provided, this constructor will initialize the matrix according to information in the reactionlist. It will be slower than other constructor due to this reason.

Parameters:
sv a StochVector type argument.
nu a StochiometryMatrix type argument.
list a ReactionList type argument.
curr_time a double argument, set the current time of the system, default to be zero.
end_time a double argument, set the end time of the system, default to be zero.

void BaseSystem::PrintAllState (  ) 

Print out the current count for ALL species.

The output is in the order of the original species' order

Print out the current count for the n th species.

The default propensity function.

This is a in memory buffer for those data points to be output.
